subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Brent Seabrook’s slap shot through a maze of players gave the Blackhawks a victory in a game that featured frantic offense, sloppy defense and some leaky goalkeeping.
snippet: Brent Seabrook’s slap shot through a maze of players gave the Blackhawks a victory in a game that featured frantic offense, sloppy defense and some leaky goalkeeping.
